markdownRemark.html:
I noticed this Tweet today, and thought it was such a great example of good a well-designed interface, and actually useful tool. I felt I needed to share it.

Announcing Landsat 8 Mosaic: fast and easy mosaic creation of landsat data! http://t.co/Gd3DZjkBJJ pic.twitter.com/htzUcqveQ5

— Vincent Sarago (@_VincentS_) June 22, 2015

There is a also link to a blog post about the tool in the Tweet.

frontmatter.title: The things you see on a journey
Mediawatch on the role of data journalism
